name: Elemental LS
author: tcrawford
description: Previously, LS Basic Clock, this very customizable clock will fit the wants and needs of anyone who desires simplicity.

1.1.6: Added many more customizability options from the initial release.
Known Bug: This may make your device respring randomly. I do belive this is due to the animation effect when notifications come through.

screenshots.1.png: The standard look of Elemental LS with no customizations.
